Get 24x7 online tutor Facility for all your Science and Maths doubts and get it solved by IITians. Virtual Schooling made easy, Schools can schedule their own Live classes, send Important Notifications and Update their school activities for particular segment of students. Now you can see Fun facts, make your study notes, attend Daily quizzes, and trace your progress too in our new Leaderboard.
Upgrade Now Progress Statistics School Settings FAQs Contact Us Share App Rate Us Terms & Conditions About Log Out The clock has been set at the server and the countdown timer at the top right corner of your screen will display the time remaining for you to complete the exam. When the clock runs out the exam ends by default and you are not required to end or submit your exam. 《Previous》 and 《Next》 button are given to switch between questions. And you can select 《Submit》whenever you want to finish your exam and submit for review. Markings Scheme:

Not only are quizzes fun for students, they are also a sneaky form of learning as they do not feel like a traditional activity. Quizzes can help your students practise existing knowledge while stimulating interest in learning about new subject matter.
